items.sentence: Tom had intended to go with Mary, but something came up and he couldn\'t.
I think that you\'re the one that I\'ve been waiting for all these years.
Tom didn\'t think that it would take a long time to complete the project.
One thing you definitely don\'t want to do is to go out alone after dark.
Our store is open every day of the year except Christmas and New Year\'s.
If you drink warm milk before you go to bed, it\'ll help you fall asleep.
Tom certainly doesn\'t seem like the kind of person that would back down.
I know Tom was the one who did it, but I won\'t ever be able to prove it.
It would\'ve been nice if Tom had listened to what I said more carefully.
After having experienced many failed relationships, Tom finally met Mary.
She advised him not to use too much salt, but he wouldn\'t listen to her.
Even though I ate three bowls of cereal for breakfast, I\'m still hungry.
I know how hard it must\'ve been for you to tell Tom about what happened.
Tom doesn\'t want to get into the water until the lifeguard goes on duty.
Tom has always known that he would eventually run his father\'s business.
How long do you think it\'s going to take you to come up with a solution?
I assume you\'re telling me now because you figured I\'d find out anyway.
Tom told Mary that he could speak French even though he really couldn\'t.
If it isn\'t out of your way, please take this letter to the post office.
Tom should\'ve laughed at Mary\'s jokes, even though they weren\'t funny.
